hymn.title: Glory be to Him who loved us

layout.singingstanza: Glo -- ry be to Him who loved us, Washed us from each sin -- ful stain; Glo -- ry be to Him who made us Priests and kings with Him to reign; Glo -- ry, wor -- ship, laud and bless -- ing To the Lamb who once was slain.

lyrics.stanza: Glory to the King of angels, Glory to the Church's King, Glory to the King of nations, Heaven and earth His praises sing; Glory ever and forever To the King of Glory bring.
